announcements.title: Regular Office Hours Resume After Holiday
announcements.content:
The City Hall of Kabankalan announces that regular office hours will resume on January 16, 2026, following the celebration of Ati-Atihan Festival. All government offices will be open from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday.

Residents are encouraged to transact business during these hours. For urgent matters during weekends or holidays, please contact the respective department's emergency hotline.
announcements.summary: City Hall resumes regular 8AM-5PM schedule starting January 16, 2026 after the Ati-Atihan Festival holiday.
announcements.author: City Information Office

announcements.title: Free Medical Check-up at City Health Office
announcements.content:
The Kabankalan City Health Office is conducting FREE medical consultations and health screenings for senior citizens and persons with disabilities (PWDs) every Wednesday of January 2026.

Services include:
- Blood pressure monitoring
- Blood sugar testing
- General consultation
- Free medicines (while supplies last)

Bring your Senior Citizen ID or PWD ID. No appointment necessary.

Venue: City Health Office, Poblacion
Time: 8:00 AM - 12:00 NN
Contact: (034) 471-2291
announcements.summary: Free health check-ups for seniors and PWDs every Wednesday in January at City Health Office.
announcements.author: City Health Office

announcements.title: Business Permit Renewal Reminder
announcements.content:
Attention all business owners!

The deadline for Business Permit Renewal for 2026 is on JANUARY 31, 2026. Renew early to avoid penalties and long queues.

Early renewals (before January 20) get a 20% discount on permit fees!

Requirements:
- 2025 Business Permit
- Updated Barangay Clearance
- Fire Safety Inspection Certificate (for applicable businesses)
- Valid ID

Office: Business Permits and Licensing Office, 2nd Floor, City Hall
Hours: Monday-Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Contact: (034) 471-2291
announcements.summary: Renew business permits before January 31, 2026. Get 20% discount for early renewal before January 20.
announcements.author: Business Permits Office
